summary: Setting DEBUGMODE to true doesn't show debug tile information

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Change OverlayConstants.DEBUGMODE to true What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The code in TilesOverlay.drawTiles should draw a cross at the center of the map. The code in TilesOverlay.TileLooper.handleTile should draw a border and tile info for each tile.

Hi,

Also it would be extremely useful if there is a way
for enable / disable the above drawing of cross / tile borders / tile info.

By either the OverlayConstants.DEBUGMODE not being final or via a set method.

Best regards, Emux
